text:
Fullstack Javascript Engineer - Qubit | Onsite | London, UK

We are looking for a passionate Fullstack JS Engineer. Currently using React, Redux and Flux. We will consider visa sponsorship for the right candidate.

More details here - https://boards.greenhouse.io/qubit/jobs/130919?gh_jid=130919...

Check out some of the links to our work via the job description. Please send your resume direct to santino@qubit.com
